content.question: An electron beam interacts with a crystal lattice, and a diffraction pattern is observed using a detector. Which of the following changes will cause the spacing between the observed diffraction maxima to increase?

choices.label: Use electrons with a smaller speed.
Use an electron beam that has a greater intensity but the same electron speed.
Move the detector closer to the crystal.
Use a crystal with a greater lattice spacing.

content.answer: Use electrons with a smaller speed.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
